entry.question: Can I play this on a character with less than 11 stars?
entry.answer: Yes, you will simply not gain the second ability. The character will still gain Bold 1, Tough 1 and 2 extra HP.

entry.question: What happens if I play this on an 11*+ character and my opponent has a card disabling my cards from scrapping Upgrades on their characters?
entry.answer: They will still scrap a card from their hand, but will not have to scrap an Upgrade.

entry.question: What happens if I play this on an 11*+ character and my opponent has a card disabling my cards from scrapping cards in their hand?
entry.answer: They would still scrap an Upgrade from one of their characters, but will not have to scrap a card from their hand.
